H0.text: who is the ceo of what 's up. Brian Acton

H1.text: who is the ceo of what 's up. Chris Daniels

H2.text: who is the ceo of what 's up. Will Cathcart

H3.text: who is the ceo of what 's up. Jan Koum

A4.text: He is the co-founder and former CEO of WhatsApp, a mobile messaging app which was acquired by Facebook in 2014 for US$19.3 billion.

A5.text: Koum granted Acton co-founder status after Acton managed to bring in $250,000 in seed funding.
